short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every tab you open raises money for a cause, Just by surfing the web, you're feeding children, protecting the rainforest and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raise money for charity with every browser tab you open!

LMGTFY Support a Cause transforms your "new tab" page. 
Each time you open a tab, an amazing new tab page filled with custom useful apps, backgrounds, and a couple banner ads. We collect ad revenue from the page and use it to donate to the cause you are supporting!

People like you have helped raising thousands of dollars for charity just by surfing the web. 
Join them by adding the extension now!
